title: Topic 002 Question 017
body: A company manages a solution that uses Azure Functions.
A function returns the following error. Azure Functions Runtime is unreachable.
You need to troubleshoot the issue.
What are two possible causes of the issue? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: The storage account application settings were deleted.
The company did not configure a timer trigger.
The storage account for the function was deleted.
